name: Time Tails (itch)
description:
* Important: Sometimes the start menu doesn't go as how should be when click start button. Restart game and press enter immediately solves the issue.

Time Tails is a game about a time traveller who arrives into a misterious town. In this town the traveller will have to prove his worth by getting 2 time orbs that will open the Time gate and allow him to continue his travel.

Time is unstable in this world, so in order to get the orbs the traveller needs to act quickly. 

The traveller needs to use the Time Orbs to progress into the game. This orbs will change the speed of the platforms in the map and will be a challenge to the traveler to get the orbs before the time is up.

Times Tail has been created following the concept proposed in the #EIITechFest22 "SPEED", by modifying the speed of the platforms in the different levels and the speed of time.

Controls:

  • Left --> A, Joystick
  • Right --> D, Joystick
  • Jump --> Space, Square in PS Controller  or A in Xbox
  • Interact --> F, Triangle in PS Controller or Y in Xbox

It's not a bug it's a feature: 

  • We had to remove the checkpoints because of a last minute unknown bug. 
  • Some platforms get stuck when getting an orb
  • UI elements don't like interacting with DualShock controllers
  • Sometimes the start menu doesn't go as how should be.

Special thanks to Alexander López Méndez from EII helping us animating the cape of the traveller.

Music by  setuniman and lustersound.

Free assets from unity marketplace.

Character asset draw by Marcial Rico Pozas.

Game made by Marcial Rico Pozas and Gema Rico Pozas
